title: Pixel’s At a Glance may soon notify you of package deliveries seen by Nest Doorbell
content:
As part of Google’s continued expansion of the Pixel series’ At a Glance features, you may soon get notifications of package deliveries spotted by your Nest Doorbell.

more…

The post Pixel’s At a Glance may soon notify you of package deliveries seen by Nest Doorbell appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google is expanding the Pixel series' At a Glance to offer notifications of package deliveries spotted by your Nest Doorbell.
